title: 你最喜欢哪4种矿物【含工业】
author: wlywly
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wlywly 于 2013-8-17 15:40 编辑 

我先吐槽：铁，煤，红石，绿宝石

replies.author: 殘奕
replies.txt_content: 钻石，红石，绿宝石，铁

replies.author: z736027620
replies.txt_content: 铁 煤 钻石 钾

replies.author: wlywly
replies.txt_content: 铁工业离不开，煤做火把压缩钻石，红石埋得深，绿宝石交易

replies.author: wlywly
replies.txt_content: 还在等什么骚年，捍卫自己喜欢的矿石吧！

replies.author: 脑残酸菜面
replies.txt_content: 好吧，铁矿，钻石矿，铀矿，和依矿

replies.author: 819tierqusi
replies.txt_content: 铁，煤，铁，煤

replies.author: torch.sun
replies.txt_content: 钻石、绿宝石、铁.

replies.author: 超音速战队
replies.txt_content: 红石、煤、钻石、铁。
